title: 1BED/1BATH APARTMENTS AVAILABLE FOR IMMEDIATE MOVE IN!!!
posting_body: ['Toscana Villas Apartments has it all', 'CALL TODAY!', 'We just don’t rent apartments, we offer a lifestyle that allows you to enjoy all that Las Vegas has to offer.', 'Our amenities, meticulously-groomed grounds, and a dedicated staff contribute to the quality of life offered at Toscana Villas.', 'Our fabulous location is just minutes from the new Las Vegas Strip and is within walking distance to shopping, award-winning schools, local museums, and neighborhood parks.', 'You will love living at Toscana Villas.', 'Because your home is our passion.', 'Amenities:', 'Fitness Center', 'Swimming Pool', 'Sports Court', 'Playground', 'Barbecue Area', 'Location:', '4775 S Topaz Street', 'Las Vegas, NV 89121', 'Rental Information:', '1BR/1BA $950/small & $1,100/large', '2BR/1BA $1,150.00', '2BR/2BA $1,185.00', '3BR/2BA $1,400.00 small', '$1,500.00 large (Washer and dryer in selected units)', 'Requirements:', 'To qualify for this apartment you must make two times the rent, not have felonies within the past 7 years, and no evictions or landlord collections within the past 5 years', 'Start online application:', 'Enter to <URL>', '-Click Apply now - new register', '-Create an account (email - password)', '-Fill out the information', '-Upload proof of income (pay stubs, SSA, SSI, bank statements, etc)', '-Upload Id and Social Security Card, ITIN', '-Pay application per adult $55', 'Application Fee: $55 | Lease Terms: 12 months', '*A $250.00 holding fee applies to secure a unit of the requested size Upon approval.', 'Holding deposits are applied to move-in charges.', 'Additional details are available on the application.', '<URL>/', 'Westland Real Estate Group is a family-owned company that features 30 multi-family communities throughout Las Vegas.', 'With over 10,000 units in the area, we offer everything from studios to three-bedroom town-homes, with a variety of in-demand amenities.', 'Enjoy stress-free living in our well-maintained communities with clean grounds and professional staff.', 'At Westland, you’ve found a place where you can invest in your future.', 'do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers']
